author: bencomic

right.text: my mustache isn't pubic. my moustache is normal hair .
i don't think pubic hair ought to be discussed openly or, in fact, ever

left.text: and it's just lemmer with his normal "too cool for you" facade. it's retarded and i don't take it seriously.

right.text: i know he has a point, but it's so like him to shit on people.

left.text: i think lemmer has a point. that just came out of nowhere, and i for one did not like it

title: TOO MUCH IS NEVER ENOUGH: PART 3
